properties.title: Strand Cafe

properties.address: Connect Ministries c/o Green Pastures Church, County Antrim BT42 3FF
properties.description: Connect Ministries is a Christian charity with a desire to bring community transformation - one life at a time - by connecting people from the place of their current reality to a stable place with a positive faith based future. The Dream Café supplies a hot meal and fellowship for those in the most deprived areas of Ballymena and beyond.
properties.title: The Dream Cafe
